title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [Typophile Film Fest 4 // Call for Entries](http://web.archive.org/web/20070723005606/http:/www.typophile.com/filmfest4 "Typophile Film Fest 4 // Call for Entries")

**Typophile Film Festival 4** will take place at the opening night of [TypeCon](http://web.archive.org/web/20070723005606/http:/www.typecon.com/) in Seattle, August 1-5, 2007.

TFF4 is a [Punchcut](http://web.archive.org/web/20070723005606/http:/www.punchcut.com/) production and is made possible through the generosity of [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20070723005606/http:/www.fontshop.com/). Special thanks to [The Society of Typographic Aficionados](http://web.archive.org/web/20070723005606/http:/www.typesociety.org/) for providing the venue.

The Typophile Film Festival is open to anything relevant to typography, design history, and/or type design. It can be educational, experimental, inspiring or humorous.
author: Zara Evens
